SEARCH
Package cz.cuni.mff.mozharon.financialaccounting.domain.repositories

Interface RecordRepositoryInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
InMemoryRecordRepository
public interface RecordRepositoryInterface
Interface defining the operations for managing financial records within the application. This includes operations for creating, finding, adding, and deleting records.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Record
    addRecord(Record record)
    Adds a record to the repository.

    Retrieves all records in the repository.

    Finds a record by its ID.

    getLastId()
    Retrieves the last assigned ID within the repository.

  • Method Details

    • createRecord

      Record createRecord(int id, Double amount, String description, DateAndTime dateAndTime, Category category, RecordType recordType) throws InvalidAmountException
      Creates a new financial record.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID to assign to the new record.
      amount - The financial amount of the record.
      description - The description of the record.
      dateAndTime - The date and time of the record.
      category - The category associated with the record.
      recordType - The type of the record (income or expense).
      Returns:
      The newly created record.
      Throws:
      InvalidAmountException - If the amount is invalid.

    • findById

      Optional<Record> findById(Long id)
      Finds a record by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the record to find.
      Returns:
      An Optional containing the found record, or an empty Optional if no record is found.

    • addRecord

      Record addRecord(Record record)
      Adds a record to the repository.
      Parameters:
      record - The record to add.
      Returns:
      The added record.

    • deleteRecord

      void deleteRecord(Record record)
      Deletes a record from the repository.
      Parameters:
      record - The record to delete.

    • findAll

      Iterable<Record> findAll()
      Retrieves all records in the repository.
      Returns:
      An iterable of all records.

    • getLastId

      int getLastId()
      Retrieves the last assigned ID within the repository.
      Returns:
      The last assigned ID.
